Versioned File Properties

Use the Properties dialog box (File | Properties) to view archive creation and lock information, workspace settings, and privilege information for a versioned file.

Field Descriptions

Versioned File Tab
Archive The location of the archive for the versioned file.
Created The date the archive was created.
Owner The user ID of the person who created the archive.
Locked by The number of users who currently have locks on revisions in the file.
Description The description entered when the file was added to the project; enter changes if necessary.
Workspace Settings Tab
Workfile Location The working directory from which revisions are checked out and to which revisions are checked in. Enter changes as necessary or click the Browse button to select a location.
Workspace Information The work environment settings assigned to the project or versioned file. If the workspace is public, the specified workfile location affects all Users who will access the project or file using the public workspace. If the workspace is private, the specified workfile location will not affect other Users.
Granted Privileges Tab
Granted Privileges list A read-only listing of privileges for actions the user can perform. These privileges are assigned to the user ID currently logged in to the project database.

See Also
